 2013-12792013-11-21,  ,  ,  ,  ,  DFATD
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectConvention on Supplementary Compensation for Nuclear Damage
PrecisOrder amending P.C. 2013-945 of September 27, 2013 authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to delegate authority to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the CONVENTION ON SUPPLEMENTARY COMPENSATION FOR NUCLEAR DAMAGE.
AttachmentsAttachment
